caption:
At the 2024 ASU+GSV & Emeritus Summit, Pranjal Kumar, CFO & Head - Corporate Development at Emeritus, shared pivotal insights on the panel 'Exporting EdTech from the East to the World,' moderated by Nitin Bhatia. Alongside Ankit Gupta, Manan Khurma, and Mike Tarrant, Pranjal highlighted the importance of 'Glocalization' in scaling education globally.

As education continues to expand beyond borders, the balance between global strategies and local insights is more important than ever. Glocalization allows educational models to adapt and thrive in diverse regions, addressing unique needs while maintaining a global perspective. By working closely with local leaders and partnering with trusted education organizations, we can create impactful, scalable solutions that resonate with diverse learners and educators across the world. 

The 3rd Annual #ASUGSVEmeritusSummit will convene over 650 thought leaders across education, technology, workforce, investors, government, and more to explore groundbreaking ideas and solutions shaping the #FutureOfEducation.

Join us in Gurgaon, February 3-5, 2025, for an inspiring dialogue that will drive education innovation forward. Click the link in the bio or visit https://emrt.us/eag25ig

#ASUGSVEmeritusSummit #AllEyesOnIndia #EdTech #EducationInnovation @asugsvsummit
